com.friendlyreminder.application

Class HomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.friendlyreminder.application.HomeController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(path="/")
public class HomeController
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring Controller that handles landing page, login, logout, and sign-up

      • welcome

        @RequestMapping(value="")
public java.lang.String welcome(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        HomeController method that handles welcome/landing page (requests to '/')
        Parameters:
        httpSession - current session that contains session attributes
        model - model object with model attributes used in displaying view
        Returns:
        String name of view file to display

      • signUp

        @RequestMapping(value="/signUp")
public java.lang.String signUp()
        method that handles requests to view signUp ('/signUp')
        Returns:
        filename of signUp view to display

      • registerUser

        @PostMapping(value="/signUp/register")
public java.lang.String registerUser(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String firstName,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String username,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String password,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String confirmPassword)
        method that handles User registration
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes - contains attributes used by controller in redirect scenario
        httpSession - contains session attrbutes, shared across session, handled by controller
        firstName - name of user to
        username - username identifier for registration
        password - password for user registration
        confirmPassword - string that should be identical to password
        Returns:
        filename of view to display

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/login")
public java.lang.String login()
        method that displays login page
        Returns:
        filename of view for login

      • validateLogin

        @PostMapping(value="/login/validate")
public java.lang.String validateLogin(org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes,
                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String username,
                                                                            @RequestParam
                                                                            java.lang.String password)
        method that validates login and adds login status to session
        Parameters:
        redirectAttributes - contains attributes used by controller in redirect scenario
        httpSession - session to save logged in user to
        username - username of User to login
        password - password to attempt validation of
        Returns:
        filename of view to display (if login successful show home, else return to login page)

      • home

        @RequestMapping(value="/home")
public java.lang.String home(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                                            org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        method to display home view
        Parameters:
        httpSession - session that will contain login status as attribute
        model - model object with model attributes used in displaying view
        Returns:
        filename of view to display (if logged in it is home, otherwise back to landing page)

      • logout

        @RequestMapping(value="/logout")
public java.lang.String logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        HomeController method that handles logout - invalidates session - redirects to landing page
        Parameters:
        httpSession - httpSession that contains login status attributes
        Returns:
        view filename and redirect command

      • getUserIdFromSession

        public static java.lang.Integer getUserIdFromSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        Method to extract unique id of logged in User
        Parameters:
        httpSession - session that contains (if it exists) logged in user status
        Returns:
        id of user logged into current session (or null if none is logged in)

      • setSessionLoggedInUserId

        public static void setSessionLoggedInUserId(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession,
                                            java.lang.Integer userId)
        Method to set unique id of new logged in User
        Parameters:
        httpSession - session that will contain new logged in attribute
        userId - userId to set

      • removeLoggedInUserIdFromSession

        public static void removeLoggedInUserIdFromSession(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession httpSession)
        Method that removes any login status attribute from current session
        Parameters:
        httpSession - session to return logged in status attributes from (if they exist)
